'''Elizabeth''' "'''Lizzie'''" '''Batty''',<ref name="marriedname" /> better known by her username '''LDShadowLady''', is an English [[YouTube]]r known for her ''Minecraft'' playthroughs.

== In the ''Minecraft'' franchise ==
{{Main|MCSM:LDShadowLady}}
In 2016, she performed as a fictionalized version of herself in {{MCSM}}, taking part in a murder mystery storyline alongside several other YouTubers. Several years later, she would participate in the [[Ender Cup]], under the team Aqua Axolotls.

To celebrate Minecraft content reaching one billion views, a skin of her was included in the in the [[YouTuber Creators Skin Pack]]. This same design was reused for her depiction in [[Caves & Cliffs Explorers]] map, where she appeared as an NPC.

In 2025, she made a cameo appearance in {{AMCM}} alongside several other creators as {{AMCM|Auction Attendees}} at an auction for {{AMCM|Steve}}'s belongings. Prior to being officially cast in the film, she posted about taking a trip to New Zealand.<ref>{{Cite Instagram|ldshadowlady|C4TMJMXy_w3|Little lonesome road trip around New Zealandüö∂‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è|March 9, 2024}}</ref>
